amendment.description: Amendment is technical in nature and clarifies which funds are available for the project-based rental assistance account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make a technical correction to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latham amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Latham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Latham amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
